title: Destined Gaming looking for Mid and Jungle for 5 Ranked Team
body:
Some things I require for this team are basic knowledge. I am not the greatest player of all time, but I work hard, and I want to improve as a team. I want people with a similar attitude. I want someone who communicates as well so if thats not you dont reply.

We are sponsored by pure addiction gaming and can find there website at pureaddictiongaming.com as well as being supported by Above Perfection (which can be found via Facebook or there website.) . We are looking to grow as a team and climb together in hopes to appear at LCS someday so if that also is not your mindset please stop here. (If you just add me without taking the time to fill these questions out I will take it that you are not serious what so ever. One word answers will also be ignored as well. Thanks for your time.)

(If you add me Write to me as well)
The Requirements:

I want Gold and up. My highest achieved is Plat 1 so I can't ask for more.

Must Have TeamSpeak

Have a decent sized champion pool, I don't want anyone who mains teemo, or master yi. You must play viable champs in the current meta.

YOU MUST WANT TO REACH THE LCS. I believe that if we play in tournaments for a year+ we can become a challenger tier team that actually stands a chance.

Dedication, you must have a passion, a push, and a desire to be a great player, on a great team. I love to have fun, and ultimately the reason I want to reach the lcs is so I can have fun, make money, and be respected in the community that i respect so much.

17+ I want decently mature people.

You must be able to put in lots of time. A schedule will be worked out between teammates, but I want us to practice 15 hours a week minimum.
